Serialized Fields

the preview of the file to display to the user

The list of tags this file has already been tagged with

All of the associated meta data that accompanies this file

boolean isSelected
Whether this file is currently selected to add tags to

CopyStatus copyStatus
Value determines what the user wants to do with the file.

javax.swing.JRadioButton copyStatusButton
The button that tells us to copy the file into our repository.

moveStatusButton

javax.swing.JRadioButton moveStatusButton
The button that tells us to move the file into our repository.

leaveStatusButton

javax.swing.JRadioButton leaveStatusButton
The button that tells us to reference the existing file. There will not be a copy in our repository.

A button to cancel the current import transaction discarding all changes

A button to finish the current import transaction, applying all changes to the model

The object that will actually do the searching.

Class edu.jhu.cs.oose.biblio.gui.TagTableModel.TagSelectionChangedEvent extends javax.swing.event.TableModelEvent implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

oldTags

java.util.Set<E> oldTags
The tags that were selected before this event.

newTags

java.util.Set<E> newTags
Tags that weren't selected before but are selected now.

removedTags

java.util.Set<E> removedTags
Tags that were selected before but aren't now. These are also in oldTags.
